GALT A bear raid is the illegal practice of ganging up to push a stocks price lower through concerted short selling and spreading adverse rumors about the targeted company A bear raid is sometimes resorted to by unscrupulous short sellers who want to make a quick buck from their short positions A bearraid target is generally a company that is going through a CHALLENGING period since its vulnerable position makes it easy fodder for short sellershmmm deja vu anybody
